text: It really was no secret anymore, but it's nice to get official confirmation of this game's release on the Switch. More people playing this awesome game is a good thing. The elegance of the controls mixed with the beautiful art and music make for a magical experience.

author: LegendOfLocky

text: Man this game... bought last year having heard lots of good things but I must say it exceeded my expectations. The controls! Ori feels soooo good when you control him, something that most of the time is overlooked by us. Of course the art style it's what's gets you at first and the music, but there's so much more like level design, the skills, everything! Can't wait for it's sequel.
